message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $9,500. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
Hello Alice, thanks for your offer. I'm interested in the product but $9,500 is a bit steep for me. Would you consider $7,000?
Bob, I appreciate your interest. While $9,500 is my initial offer, I could come down to $8,750.  I believe this product will be very valuable for you and this is my best offer.
Alice, I appreciate you working with me on the price.  While this product would be great, $8,750 is still a bit higher than I'd like to go.  How about we meet in the middle at $8,000?
